ygData.subject: Re: OOC r/l musical bards?
ygData.msgSnippet: I actually do have a bit of musical talent.  I have competed in several Barbershop Quartet contests and done quite well, I have been accepted to All State
ygData.messageBody:
I actually do have a bit of musical talent. I have competed in several Barbershop
Quartet contests and done quite well, I have been accepted to All State choirs two
years in a row, at one time I performed in 10 different groups at once one of which
was a show choir (dance and sing stuff) I was also the Drum Major of my high school
marching band. Musics is in my blood I guess and being a bard seemed only natural
to me personally.


Jessica Hankins wrote:

> From: Jessica Hankins <polyhymnia@...>
>
> Most of the musical abilities of bard is game has nothing to do with what
> musical training I have :-) My lyrics are shotty at best, but it doesn't stop me
> from trying! Two years of college music playing brass instruments-- everything
> from Mozart to Ska and back again :-)
>
> --Shulzari
> Poswardd E'ci
> http://www.soerbaird.com
>
> James Schuldes wrote:
>
> > From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
> >
> > So we are all real good online Bards and have excellent musical abilities to
> > the point of powerful magic, etc. But what about in /ooc real life? Anyone
> > have any talent or interest?
>
